prompt:
Write Python code that defines the following pandas DataFrame representing car sales:

import pandas as pd
data = {
    "CarID": ["C001", "C002", "C003", "C004", "C005", "C006"],
    "Brand": ["Toyota", "Honda", "Ford", "Toyota", "BMW", "Honda"],
    "Model": ["Camry", "Civic", "Focus", "Rav4", "X5", "Accord"],
    "Year": [2020, 2021, 2019, 2022, 2023, 2020],
    "PriceUSD": [25000, 22000, 18000, 30000, 60000, 24000],
    "Mileage": [30000, 20000, 45000, 15000, 5000, 35000]
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

After creating the DataFrame, the code should: 1) Filter the DataFrame to include only cars of the "Toyota" brand. 2) For these Toyota cars, calculate and print the average "Mileage". Provide only Python code.
evaluation_criteria: Code should correctly define the DataFrame, filter for Toyota cars, and accurately calculate their average mileage.
